item.description: Optical Character Recognition Our pipeline to automatically recognize handwritten text includes: page segmentation (先分一個大塊的)[1] and line segmentation（再拆成line) [2], followed by handwriting recognition(接著再做辨識) is illustrated in Figure The pipeline of this component is presented in Figure 2. The input is an image containing a line of text and the output of the module is a string of the text. 另外一個例子是辨識圖中的某塊文字 method 1 : LSTM/RNN (1) Handwriting detection (CNN-biLSTM) The handwriting detection takes the input image containing a line of text and returns a matrix containing probability of each character appearing.
